description:

Says he is straight, watched straight porn to get hard and off to, but there is some sugar there when he talks and moves.

I always hate to make these comments, cuz he probably is straight, but honestly, I just wanted to put gay porn on for him to see how he would have responded.
Regardless, he is one hot boy. He is former wrestler (no comments from the Peanut Gallery!), and is in great shape!
For 19 he looks much more mature. The goatee helps, but as he told me, he can't grow a full beard, as it only seems to grow on his chin and upper lip. You know those full beards don't really start showing up till your late 20's.
He was a little nervous during the video, but did a great job showing off his hot cock AND his amazing bubble butt. Damn! What a nice ass! Anyone want to bury their face (or cock!) in it!?
He didn't seem particularly interested in doing guy-on-guy work, but I have learned to never say never!
title: Ross Morris - Solo
